spiritsExplanation: The video represents a 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit, evident from the focus on stretching, improving mobility, and the healing aspect of addressing bodily stiffness, as noted in the title and comments. This suggests an organized, educational setup, with a score of 0.6 to indicate the secondary significance of this spirit.
